item.description:
KING RICHARD'S FAIRE, in it's 28th season, is a vivid recreation of a 16th century English marketplace at festival time. Actors, dancers, puppeteers, jugglers, minstrels, mimes, magicians and musicians perform each weekend for the favor of his Royal Highness King Richard.
Royalty and beggars, highwaymen and guards, knights and wenches, swordsmen and soothsayers roam throughout the 80 acre wooded village while artisans hawk and display a wide array of unique hand-made wares. The Royal Chefs prepare delectable edibles authentic to Renaissance times. Exotic animals, jousting knights on horseback, challenging games and Renaissance merriment round out a day at The Faire.

COST: $26.00 ( coupons may be downloaded from their website and MAY? also be found in
The Boston Globe on Thuirs and Sundays)
WEBSITE: www.kingrichardsfaire.net
** Much more info about the faire can be found on the site.

***NOTE: I have the meetup time at 12:00 noon. If you'd like to go earlier? Let me know. The hours are 10:30 am - 6pm . If you wish to attend, please indicate with your RSVP as to carpooling. Last year we tried to go but it got rained out : ( So, let's hope for a great day of FUN this year! This is a combined event with other meetup grps
item.how_to_find_us: we will all meetup at the entrance - ticket sales. I will have a meetup sign
item.name: A Day @ KING RICHARD'S FAIRE
